trans-unit.source: The XpsImage class has no public constructor.
trans-unit.target: XpsImage 类具有没有公共构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> method to add an image and obtain a reference to it in a new document.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A>方法中添加图像并获取新的文档中对它的引用。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader.GetImage%2A> method to obtain an image reference in an existing document.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader.GetImage%2A>方法来获取现有文档中的映像引用。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader.GetImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Based on settings of <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, the flush operation of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> method of the XpsImage class may be delayed until the complete <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> is closed.
trans-unit.target: 根据设置<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>和<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>，如<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>和<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>的刷新操作<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A>XpsImage 类的方法可能推迟到完整<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>已关闭。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>
